on reading compounds: 続出【ゾクシュツ】appearing one after another, cropping up one after another, occurring in succession
持続【ジゾク】continuation, persisting, lasting, sustaining, enduring
続日本紀【ショクニホンギ】Shoku Nihongi (second of the six classical Japanese history texts)
kun reading compounds: 続く【つづく】to continue, to last, to go on, to continue (without a break), to be unbroken, to occur again and again, to lead to, to connect to, to adjoin, to come after, to follow, to succeed, to rank next to, to hold out, to keep, to last
続ける【つづける】to continue, to keep up, to keep on
